name: Arpeggio (LoLQa)
description:
You have to defend a pianist from ghosts!

you can do powerful and long combos to the enemies! Try to get a high score!

---------------------------------------C O N T R O L S------------------------------------------------
WASD to move

Left Click to Light attack

Right Click to Heavy Attack

Q for Special1

E for special2

------------------------------------------TEAM MEMBERS------------------------------------------
Lolqa/Stuart: Game design and coding

Lexany and Edgard: Graphics 

Chin: Music and sounds

(we used some samples for the sounds from Creative Commons)
